name: Insanely Accurate ABT3
description:
MADE FOR TRIJAM #211 DEVELOPMENT TIME

The game was made in 2h 58m 30sec!

BREAKDOWN
  • 40 min of figuring out why Unity won't let me create a new Project.
  • 1h35 of coding, creating textures and terrain, and producing the only sfx the game has.
  • Next day: 45 min of coding and adding UI and deploying the game in Windows & Web format.
THE GAME DESCRIPTION

Train your aiming skills like a pro & shoot down the 5 targets in the fastest possible way!

CONTROLS
  • MOUSE: Look Around
  • LEFT CLICK: Shoot
SHARE YOUR BEST RESULT!

Share your best time below in the comments!
